rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 11 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:30 PM, 06 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Pampanga, Bataan, Bulacan and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Quezon(Tiaong, Dolores, Candelaria, Sariaya, Tayabas, San Antonio, Catanauan, General Luna, Macalelon, Lucban), Batangas(Lipa, Santo Tomas, Malvar, Balete, Mataasnakahoy, Tanauan, Rosario, Padre Garcia, San Juan, Taysan, Batangas City, Lobo, Ibaan, San Jose, Cuenca, Talisay, Nasugbu), Cavite(Tagaytay, Magallanes, General Emilio Aguinaldo, Silang, Amadeo, Maragondon), Zambales(Masinloc, Santa Cruz, Candelaria, Palauig, Botolan), Rizal(Antipolo), Nueva Ecija(Gabaldon, General Tinio) and Laguna(Calamba, Cabuyao, San Pablo, Alaminos, Majayjay, Liliw, Nagcarlan, Rizal) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
